summary: A configuration container that specifies all architectural and training hyperparameters for the text encoder component of the OwlViT multimodal model, allowing consistent instantiation of the transformer‑based text model.
business_intent: Provide developers with a flexible, reproducible way to set up and customize the OwlViT text encoder for downstream vision‑language applications, ensuring compatibility with pretrained checkpoints and easy adjustment of model size and behavior.
